description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to shop premises
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2019 - 70 - 01 (Rev A)  Received:  09 March 2020
2019 - 70 - 03 (Rev A); 2019 - 70 - 04 (Rev A)
Received:  12 March 2020) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - No additional doors, windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the single storey rear extension hereby approved.

Condition : 5 - The main section of the single storey rear extension (measuring 22 square metres) as annotated storage and wheelie bin area shall be used for these ancillary purposes to the existing retail use only, and shall not be converted to provide additional retail floorspace or for any other use.

Condition : 6 - Waste and recyclable materials shall only be stored within the annotated waste storage area included in the approved plan 2019 - 70 - 03 (Rev A).   No waste or recycled materials shall be stored or placed on the public highway or footway or the private rear shared alleyway to the rear of the site at any time apart from specific collection times, following which bins shall be returned to the designated off-street storage area without delay.

Condition : 7 - No external plant or machinery, including air conditioning equipment, extract ducting or refrigeration equipment shall be installed without first obtaining the permission of the local planning authority obtained through the submission of a planning application
